summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Assisted Bug Creation feature. Backend: 10/10 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows tested successfully including AI chat dialog, streaming responses, proposal generation, and bug creation from proposal.

issues: Minor React warning: 'Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent' - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: POST /api/bugs/ai/chat - Returns streaming SSE response (200 OK)
POST /api/bugs/ai/chat - AI asks about the problem first
POST /api/bugs/ai/chat - AI continues conversation with follow-up questions
POST /api/bugs/ai/chat - AI generates proposal when enough info provided
POST /api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal - Creates bug with all fields (200 OK)
POST /api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal - Validates severity (400 for invalid)
POST /api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal - Validates priority (400 for invalid)
POST /api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal - Works with only required fields
POST /api/bugs/ai/chat - Requires authentication (401 Unauthorized)
POST /api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal - Requires authentication (401 Unauthorized)
Frontend: /bugs page has 'Report Bug with AI' button
Frontend: AI chat dialog opens correctly
Frontend: Conversation auto-starts with 'Hi, I want to report a bug.'
Frontend: AI response streams in real-time
Frontend: User messages are sent and displayed correctly
Frontend: AI asks questions one at a time (problem, steps, expected, actual, environment)
Frontend: Proposal card appears when AI has enough info
Frontend: 'Create Bug' button creates bug from proposal
Frontend: Dialog closes after bug creation
Frontend: Created bug appears in bug list with correct data
Frontend: Manual bug creation still works
critical_code_review_comments: AI chat endpoint correctly implements SSE streaming with proper event format
Conversation history is properly passed to LLM for context continuity
Proposal extraction from AI response uses regex to find JSON block in markdown code fence
Frontend correctly handles streaming response with ReadableStream API
Bug creation from proposal validates severity and priority against allowed values
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
test_credentials: Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev, session via POST /api/auth/test-login or 'Test Login' button
seed_data_creation: Created test bugs during testing (TEST_ prefixed), all cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: AI-Assisted Bug Creation feature is fully functional. The AI chat endpoint (/api/bugs/ai/chat) streams responses and guides users through: 1) Problem description, 2) Steps to reproduce, 3) Expected behavior, 4) Actual behavior, 5) Environment. When enough info is gathered, AI generates a JSON proposal with all bug fields. The create-from-proposal endpoint (/api/bugs/ai/create-from-proposal) creates the bug. Frontend has 'Report Bug with AI' button that opens chat dialog with auto-start message. Manual bug creation also works. Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev via Test Login button.
